output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
#Libraries
library("ggplot2")
library("ggthemes")



data <- read.csv("./Data/Bylaw_Infractions.csv", header = T)
names(data)
View(data)
```

```{r}
SummaryOfYearTotal <- aggregate(data$COUNT, by = list(data$YEAR, data$COMPLAINT), sum)
colnames(SummaryOfYearTotal) <- c("YEAR", "COMPLAINT", "Total")
ggplot() + geom_line(aes(x = SummaryOfYearTotal$YEAR , y = SummaryOfYearTotal$Total, colour = SummaryOfYearTotal$COMPLAINT)) + theme(legend.position = "bottom", legend.title = element_blank()) + labs(x = "Year", y = "Observations") + ggtitle("Total Complaints by Year and Complaint Type")
```
